calculations.name: Select Current YTD vs Last YTD
calculations.tableau_expression:
YEAR([Order Date]) >= YEAR(TODAY())-1 
	AND (MONTH([Order Date]) < MONTH(TODAY()) 
        OR (MONTH([Order Date]) == MONTH(TODAY()) 
			AND DAY([Order Date]) <= DAY(TODAY())))

calculation_context.Expression:
YEAR([Order Date]) >= YEAR(TODAY())-1 
	AND (MONTH([Order Date]) < MONTH(TODAY())
